foreignData.name: Donner-Totem
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {W}.
{1}{W}{W}: Das Donner-Totem wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 2/2 weißen Geist-Artefaktkreatur mit Erstschlag und Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.name: Tótem del trueno
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {W} a tu reserva de maná.
{1}{W}{W}: El Tótem del trueno es una criatura artefacto Espíritu blanca 2/2 con las habilidades de volar y dañar primero hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Totem de tonnerre
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {W} à votre réserve.
{1}{W}{W} : Le Totem de tonnerre devient une créature-artefact 2/2 blanche Esprit avec le vol et l'initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.name: Totem del Tuono
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {W} alla tua riserva di mana.
{1}{W}{W}: Il Totem del Tuono diventa una creatura artefatto Spirito 2/2 bianca con volare e attacco improvviso fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: 雷のトーテム像
foreignData.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{W}を加える。
{1}{W}{W}：ターン終了時まで、雷のトーテム像は飛行と先制攻撃を持つ白の２/２のスピリット・アーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。

foreignData.name: Totem do Trovão
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {W} à sua reserva de mana.
{1}{W}{W}: Totem do Trovão torna-se uma criatura artefato branca 2/2 do tipo Espírito com a habilidade de voar e iniciativa até o final do turno.

foreignData.name: Громовой Тотем
foreignData.text:
{T}: Добавьте {W} в ваше хранилище маны.
{1}{W}{W}: Громовой Тотем становится артефактным существом 2/2 белый Дух с полетом и первым ударом до конца хода.

foreignData.name: 雷霆图腾像
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{W}到你的法术力池中。
{1}{W}{W}：雷霆图腾像成为2/2白色，具飞行与先攻异能的精怪神器生物直到回合结束。

name: Thunder Totem
originalText:
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{1}{W}{W}: Thunder Totem becomes a 2/2 white Spirit artifact creature with flying and first strike until end of turn.

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text:
{T}: Add {W}.
{1}{W}{W}: Thunder Totem becomes a 2/2 white Spirit artifact creature with flying and first strike until end of turn.
